channel.title: 'whonixcheck' goes on loop
channel.description:
When i run the command 'whonixcheck' in the terminal i see this mesage repeated for about one, two minutes:
[INFO] [whonixcheck] Tor Connection Result: - Connecting for 12 seconds. | 100 % done. - Tor Circuit: established. - Tor reports: NOTICE BOOTSTRAP PROGRESS=100 TAG=done SUMMARY="Done" - Timesync status: not done. - sdwdate reports: Initial time fetching in progress...
What does it mean and why it's happening? Can it be prevented?

item.title: 'whonixcheck' goes on loop
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Works as expected. Keep you posted on progress.

Read full topic

item.title: 'whonixcheck' goes on loop
item.dc:creator: Simon707
item.description:
When i run the command ‘whonixcheck’ in the terminal i see this mesage repeated for about one, two minutes:

[INFO] [whonixcheck] Tor Connection Result:
- Connecting for 12 seconds. | 100 % done. 
- Tor Circuit: established.
- Tor reports: NOTICE BOOTSTRAP PROGRESS=100 TAG=done SUMMARY="Done"
- Timesync status: not done.
- sdwdate reports: Initial time fetching in progress...

What does it mean and why it’s happening? Can it be prevented?

Read full topic
